00007 ns::import('hygia.libs.core.TestLogger');
00008 ns::import('hygia.libs.io.Request');
00009 ns::import('hygia.libs.io.Response');

00017 class TestItem {
00018 
00019     // debug: 1 = show request and response
00020     const    DEBUG = 0;
00021

00023     private $sPath;
00024     private $sUser;
00025     private $sPass;
00026     private $oInput;
00027     private $oOutput;

00035     public function __construct($sTitle = '', $sPath = '') {
00036         $this->setTitle($sTitle);
00037         $this->setPath($sPath);
00038         $this->sUser = '';
00039         $this->sPass = '';
00040     }

00077     public function getAuth() {
00078         return base64_encode($this->sUser . ':' . $this->sPass);
00079     }

00108     public function run($sProtocol = null, $sServer = null, $iPort = 80) {
00109 
00110         // don't even bother when server is not provided
00111         if (empty($sServer)) {
00112             return false;
00113         }
00114 
00115         // unknown protocol? currently only http and https are supported
00116         if ($sProtocol != 'http' && $sProtocol != 'https') {
00117             return false;
00118         }
00119 
00120         TestLogger::log('<br />');
00121         TestLogger::log('<h3>Test: ' . $this->sTitle . '</h3>');
00122 
00123         try {
00124 
00125             // get request arguments, run plugin(s)...
00126             $oRequest = $this->oInput->getRequest();
00127 
00128             // send request and receive response
00129             $oResponse = $this->sendRequest($sProtocol . '://' . $sServer . ':' . $iPort . $this->sPath, $oRequest);
00130 
00131             // set response object in output, run plugin(s) and get processed response
00132             $this->oOutput->setResponse($oResponse);
00133             $oResponse = $this->oOutput->getResponse();
00134 
00135             // validate
00136             $oValidators = $this->oOutput->getValidators();
00137             if ($oValidators->getValidatorCount() == 0) {
00138                 TestLogger::log('<span class="debug">No validators defined for this end point</span>');
00139             } else {
00140                 $oValidators->validateBatch($oResponse);
00141                 if ($oValidators->isValid()) {
00142                     TestLogger::log('<span class="good">Ran ' . Utils::getNoun($oValidators->getValidatorCount(), 'validator', 'validators') . ' successfully!</span>');
00143                 } else {
00144                     TestLogger::log('<span class="warn">Ran ' . Utils::getNoun($oValidators->getValidatorCount(), 'validator', 'validators') . ': ' . $oValidators->getValidCount() . ' ok, ' . Utils::getNoun($oValidators->getFailCount(), 'fail', 'fails') . '</span>');
00145                     TestLogger::log('<span class="warnsub"><ol><li>' . implode("</li>\r\n<li>", $oValidators->getValidationErrors()) . "</li>\r\n</ol></span>");
00146                 }
00147             }
00148             return $oValidators->isValid();
00149 
00150         } catch (Exception $e) {
00151 
00152             TestLogger::log('<span class="warn">An error occured: ' . $e->getMessage() . '</span>');
00153             return false;
00154 
00155         }
00156 
00157     }
00158 
00170     private function sendRequest($sUrl, Request $oRequest) {
00171 
00172         $sDebugUid = 'id' . uniqid(rand(), true);
00173 
00174         // parse url and get parts
00175         $aUrlParts = parse_url($sUrl);
00176         $sScheme = isset($aUrlParts['scheme']) ? $aUrlParts['scheme'] : 'http';
00177         $sServer = isset($aUrlParts['host']) ? $aUrlParts['host'] : 'localhost';
00178         $sPort = isset($aUrlParts['port']) ? $aUrlParts['port'] : 80;
00179         $sPath = isset($aUrlParts['path']) ? $aUrlParts['path'] : '/';
00180 
00181         // handle get/post
00182         $sFullPath = $sPath;
00183         $sGetQuery = $oRequest->getRequestByType(Variable::TYPE_GET);
00184         $sPostQuery = $oRequest->getRequestByType(Variable::TYPE_POST);
00185         $sBody = $oRequest->getBody();
00186         $sMimeType = $oRequest->getMimeType();
00187 
00188         // get request
00189         if (!empty($sGetQuery)) {
00190             $sFullPath .= '?' . $sGetQuery;
00191         }
00192 
00193         // posting a form
00194         if (!empty($sPostQuery) && empty($sBody)) {
00195             $sBody = $sPostQuery;
00196             $sMimeType = 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded';
00197         }
00198 
00199         // posting vars and body: create multi-part mime body (rfc-1867 compliant)
00200         if (!empty($sPostQuery) && !empty($sBody)) {
00201             $aPostVars = $oRequest->getRequestVars()->getByType(Variable::TYPE_POST);
00202             $sMimeType = 'multipart/form-data; boundary=' . md5($sDebugUid);
00203             $sFile = $sBody;
00204 
00205             // add post vars
00206             $sBody = '';
00207             foreach ($aPostVars as $sName => $sValue) {
00208                 $sBody .= '--' . md5($sDebugUid) . "\r\n";
00209                 $sBody .= 'Content-Disposition: form-data; name="' . $sName . '"' . "\r\n\r\n" . $sValue . "\r\n";
00210             }
00211 
00212             // add file
00213             $sBody .= '--' . md5($sDebugUid) . "\r\n";
00214             $sBody .= 'Content-Disposition: form-data; name="' . $oRequest->getBodyName() . '"; filename="' . $oRequest->getBodyFileName() . '"' . "\r\n";
00215             $sBody .= 'Content-Type: ' . $oRequest->getMimeType() . "\r\n\r\n";
00216             $sBody .= $sFile . "\r\n";
00217 
00218             // end
00219             $sBody .= '--' . md5($sDebugUid) . '--' . "\r\n";
00220 
00221         }
00222 
00223         // handle protocol
00224         if ($sScheme == 'https') {
00225             $sPort = 443;
00226             $sTransportUrl = 'ssl://' . $sServer;
00227         } else {
00228             $sTransportUrl = 'tcp://' . $sServer;
00229         }
00230 
00231         try {
00232 
00233             // prepare request: define full message to send over socket
00234             $iSize = strlen($sBody);
00235             $sHeaders = (($iSize > 0) ? 'POST' : 'GET') . ' ' . $sFullPath . ' HTTP/1.0' . "\r\n" .
00236                         'Host: ' . $sServer . "\r\n" .
00237                         'User-Agent: ' . TestConfig::ApplicationTitle . ' ' .
00238                                          TestConfig::ApplicationVersion . "\r\n" .
00239                         (($iSize > 0) ? 'Content-Length: ' . $iSize . "\r\n" : "") .
00240                         (($iSize > 0) ? 'Content-Type: ' . $sMimeType . "\r\n" : "") .
00241                         $oRequest->getHeaders(true) .
00242                         'Keep-Alive: 300' . "\r\n" .
00243                         'Connection: keep-alive' . "\r\n" .
00244                         ((!empty($this->sUser) && !empty($this->sPass)) ? 'Authorization: Basic ' . $this->getAuth() . "\r\n" : "");
00245 
00246             $sContent = ((!empty($sBody)) ? $sBody . "\r\n" : "");
00247 
00248             // display some info...
00249             $sPath4log = $sScheme . '://' . $sServer . ($sPort != 80 ? ':' . $sPort : '') . $sFullPath;
00250             TestLogger::log('<span class="info">[<a href="javascript:Utils.dspSwitch(\'debug_request' . $sDebugUid . '\')">Show/Hide request</a>] End point: <a href="' . $sPath4log . '" target="_blank">' . $sPath4log . '</a></span>');
00251 
00252             TestLogger::log('<div id="debug_request' . $sDebugUid . '" style="margin-bottom:20px; display:' . (TestItem::DEBUG ? 'block' : 'none') . '">' .
00253                              'request:' .
00254                              '<div class="headers"><pre>' . $sHeaders . '</pre></div>');
00255             if (!empty($sContent)) {
00256                 TestLogger::log('<div class="content"><pre>' . htmlentities($sContent) . '</pre></div>');
00257             }
00258             TestLogger::log('</div>');
00259 
00260             TestLogger::log('<div id="' . $sDebugUid . '" class="wait">Connecting...</div>');
00261 
00262             // open a socket connection with host (surpressing warnings/notices)
00263             $iStartConnectionTime = microtime(true);
00264             $fp = @fsockopen($sTransportUrl, $sPort, $iErrorNr, $sErrorMsg);
00265             if (!$fp) {
00266                 throw new RequestException('Unable to connect to ' . $sServer . ' at port ' . $sPort . ': (' . $iErrorNr . ') ' . $sErrorMsg);
00267             }
00268 
00269             // time out stuff (turned off at the moment, doesn't seem to work...)
00270             //stream_set_blocking($fp, 0);
00271             //stream_set_timeout($fp, 2);
00272 
00273             // send request message
00274             $sRequest = $sHeaders . "\r\n" . $sContent;
00275             $iStartTransferTime = microtime(true);
00276             $bWriteOk = fwrite($fp, $sRequest);
00277             if ($bWriteOk === false) {
00278                 throw new RequestException('Unable to send data.');
00279             }
00280 
00281             // request
00282             // ----------------------------------------------------------
00283             // response
00284 
00285             // recieve response (surpressing warnings/notices)
00286             $sResponse = '';
00287             while (!feof($fp)) $sResponse .= @fread($fp, 128);
00288             $aStreamInfo = stream_get_meta_data($fp);
00289             fclose($fp);
00290             $iConnectionTime = microtime(true) - $iStartConnectionTime;
00291             $iTransferTime = microtime(true) - $iStartTransferTime;
00292 
00293         } catch (Exception $e) {
00294 
00295             // hide connection progress indicator and rethrow exception
00296             TestLogger::log('<script type="text/javascript">document.getElementById("' . $sDebugUid . '").style.display="none";</script>');
00297             throw $e;
00298 
00299         }
00300 
00301         // display some info...
00302         TestLogger::log('<script type="text/javascript">document.getElementById("' . $sDebugUid . '").style.display="none";</script>');
00303         TestLogger::log('<span class="debug">' . ((!$aStreamInfo['timed_out'] && !empty($sResponse)) ? '[<a href="javascript:Utils.dspSwitch(\'debug_response' . $sDebugUid . '\')">Show/Hide response</a>] ' : '') . 'Received response. Total time: ' . round($iConnectionTime, 2) . ' seconds, transfer time: ' . round($iTransferTime, 2) . ' seconds.</span>');
00304 
00305         //print 'stream info: <pre>' . print_r($aStreamInfo, 1) . '</pre>';
00306 
00307         // time out?
00308         if ($aStreamInfo['timed_out']) {
00309             throw new ResponseException('Error: Connection timed out.');
00310         }
00311 
00312         // skip on error
00313         if (empty($sResponse)) {
00314             throw new ResponseException('Error: Empty response.');
00315         }
00316 
00317         // get headers and body from response
00318         list($sHeaders, $sContent) = split("\r?\n\r?\n", $sResponse, 2);
00319         $aHeaders = split("\r?\n", $sHeaders);
00320 
00321         TestLogger::log('<div id="debug_response' . $sDebugUid . '" style="margin-bottom:20px; display:' . (TestItem::DEBUG ? 'block' : 'none') . '">' .
00322                          'response:' .
00323                          '<div class="headers"><pre>' . $sHeaders . '</pre></div>');
00324         if (!empty($sContent)) {
00325             TestLogger::log('<div class="content"><pre>' . htmlentities($sContent) . '</pre></div>');
00326         }
00327         TestLogger::log('</div>');
00328 
00329         // get http status info
00330         $iStatusCode = (preg_match("/^http\/\S+ (\d+) /i", $sHeaders, $a)) ? $a[1] : 0;
00331         $sStatusMsg  = (preg_match("/^http\/\S+ \d+ (.*)/i", $sHeaders, $a)) ? $a[1] : '';
00332 
00333         // follow redirects...
00334         if ($iStatusCode == 302) {
00335             // TODO: server might have send set-cookie headers: so set the cookies here
00336             $sUrl = (preg_match( "/location\:\s+(.*)/i", $sHeaders, $a )) ? trim($a[1]) : '';
00337             return $this->sendRequest($sUrl, $oRequest);
00338         }
00339 
00340         // skip on error
00341         if ($iStatusCode != 200) {
00342             throw new ResponseException('Error: Problem with response, returned http status code: ' . $iStatusCode . ', message: ' . $sStatusMsg);
00343         }
00344 
00345         // instantiate response object and initialize it
00346         $oResponse = new Response();
00347         $oResponse->setHeaders($aHeaders);
00348         $oResponse->setBody($sContent);
00349         $oResponse->setConnectionTime($iConnectionTime);
00350         $oResponse->setTransferTime($iTransferTime);
00351 
00352         // return response object
00353         return $oResponse;
00354 
00355     }
00356 
00357 }
